message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a serious offer on the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $105. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value this product brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $102. It's a fair price, considering the value this product brings. I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $102, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to pay $99 for the product. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
